modifyFundPassword.title: Set up Fund Password
modifyFundPassword.des: *Please remeber your funds password. Forgotten password can't be recovered.
modifyFundPassword.warning2: Fund password and login password can`t be same
modifyFundPassword.warning7: Passwords must be at least 8-20 characters with 1 capital letter and 1 number
modifyFundPassword.warning8: The confirm  fund password is required.
